title: Anyone have a clue?
body: Does anyone have any clues on when soulstealer vlad will go on sale?

replies.body: A couple of leaks mention that Soulstealer vladmir will be available on sale in the next major update where IP is replaced with blue essence, However, these are just rumors and until Riot officially announces the discount, no one knows :I
It's been about a year since he was last on sale, so hopefully soon. Keep an eye out for the future sales schedules.
